nodes.text: MR-T3 was a black R4-series agromech droid, which was used at the Republic military base on Coruscant.

MR-T3 accompanied an RA-7 protocol droid designated R-A7 at the Republic military base when Ahsoka Tano escaped from the clone shock troopers, after being suspected on murdering Letta Turmond and three clone troopers. Tano almost kicked up the droid while jumping over it, making the droid spin around.
